text: I'm trying to trigger a webhook from a workflow. HubSpot indicates that the webhook is being called (but indicates it is returning a 401 response). I'm not seeing any indication on our server that the webhook is ever called. (I'm using basic auth with the username password in the URL like <http://username>:<mailto:password@myurl.com|password@myurl.com>) When I call that URL from my computer the webhook works fine. Has anyone else run into this issue?
